title: Treasure Island by Robert Louis Stevenson
description:
Author: Robert Louis Stevenson
Published: 1883
Language: English
Wordcount: 68,021 / 182 pg



A masterful tale of ''buccaneers and buried gold''. First published in the children's magazine Young Folks, and considered a coming of age story, it is an adventure tale of superb atmosphere, character, and action, as well as a wry commentary on the ambiguity of moralityÃ¢â‚¬â€as seen in Long John SilverÃ¢â‚¬â€unusual for children's literature then and now. It is one of the most frequently dramatised of all novels, and its influence on popular lore about pirates can not be overestimated.
